abstract: The part of “Megyn Kelly Presents” that featured Donald Trump drew 5.2 million viewers, while the show as a whole attracted 4.8 million.
snippet: The part of “Megyn Kelly Presents” that featured Donald Trump drew 5.2 million viewers, while the show as a whole attracted 4.8 million.
lead_paragraph: Relentless ads promised a showdown for the ages, and Donald J. Trump even made a personal appeal, pledging to post his own pithy commentary on Twitter in real time.

headline.main: More Watch ‘NCIS’ and ‘Voice’ Than Kelly’s Trump Interview
headline.print_headline: More Watch ‘NCIS’ and “Voice’ Than Kelly’s Trump Interview
